NavigationDestinationId.summary:
The id read-only property of the
interface returns the value of the destination if the is traverse, or null otherwise.

remarks.para: The id is a unique, UA-generated value that always represents the history entry, useful to correlate a history entry with an external resource such as a storage cache.

-Modern client-side routing: the Navigation API
-Navigation API explainer
-Domenic Denicola's Navigation API live demo

NavigationDestinationId.value: A string representing the id of the destination , or null.
